topic.title: Installing the Oxygen Content Fusion Connector Add-on

keywords.indexterm: Installing Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on

body.note: The Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on is compatible with Oxygen XML Editor or Oxygen XML Author versions 19.0 and later.
body.p:
As the Content Author, to install the Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on, follow these steps:
In Oxygen XML Editor or Oxygen XML Author, go to Help / Install new add-ons to open an add-on selection dialog box.
Enter or paste http://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Addons/default/updateSite.xml in the Show add-ons from field or select it from the drop-down menu.
Select Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on and click Next.
Select the I accept all terms of the end user license agreement option and click Finish.
Restart the application.
Result: The Show Content Fusion Task Manager button is now available on the toolbar. Clicking it will open the Content Fusion Task Manager view.
